text: I tried copy pasting <https://github.com/JuliaPlots/GLMakie.jl/blob/master/.github/workflows/ci.yml> but seems that GLFW.jl still fails to build

elements.text: but seems that GLFW.jl still fails to build

text: Copy pasting all of it or just portions? I was using `runs-on: ubuntu-20.04` (i.e. the 'real' latest) container, and the rest of the script failed. Returning back to `runs-on: ubuntu-latest` (which is actually v19) got it working.
